_header: In the way of penance of bitterness

OxfMagd93.First Lines:
In þe wey of penance of butturnessIn þe wey of obedience
                    and of lownesseIn þe wey of loue and of swettnesse
OxfMagd93.Editions:
Coxe,  Henry Octavius. 
             Catalogus codicum mss. qui in collegiis aulisque
                oxoniensibus….
         Oxon: e Typographeo academico, 1852: 50.
